entry.title: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.5.1
entry.summary: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.5.1 is now available. It includes some minor enhancements and bug fixes. Read below for more details.
entry.content:
Scan2Deploy Studio 2.5.1 is now available. It includes some minor enhancements and bug fixes. Read below for more details.

Downloads are available in the Releases section on the Scan2Deploy Studio Github page.

Enhancementsâ€‹

  • Added support for multi-select controls in Device & Scanner Settings

Corrected Defectsâ€‹

  • Fixed an issue where invalid values for Quickboard height could be saved in the configuration data under some scenarios
  • Fixed styling of deeply nested controls in Device & Scanner Settings

entry.title: Aladdin for CODiScan 3.6.0
entry.summary: The Aladdin application for CODiScan version 3.6.0 is now available.
entry.content:
The Aladdin application for CODiScan version 3.6.0 is now available.

Downloads are available in the Releases section on the Aladdin Github page.

Enhancementsâ€‹

  • Added Native Interface option to the Integration Method setting
  • Removed Track Scan History popup

Corrected Defectsâ€‹

  • Fixed cosmetic issues

entry.title: CODiScan SDK v1.1.0
entry.summary: The CODiScanâ„¢ HS7600 SDK v1.1.0 is now available.
entry.content:
The CODiScanâ„¢ HS7600 SDK v1.1.0 is now available.

CODiScan Service v1.1.0, is available from GitHub.

The SDK v1.1.0 can be imported into projects via Jitpack:

Enhancementsâ€‹

  • Minimum Android SDK support now 29 and above.

Corrected Defectsâ€‹

  • CODiScan device now reconnects automatically after either going out of range or auto-power off, when CODiScan device is detected.

entry.title: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.5.0
entry.summary: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.5.0 is now available. It includes many new enhancements and bug fixes. Read below for more details.
entry.content:
Scan2Deploy Studio 2.5.0 is now available. It includes many new enhancements and bug fixes. Read below for more details.

Downloads are available in the Releases section on the Scan2Deploy Studio Github page.

Enhancementsâ€‹

OCR Editor âœ¨â€‹

  • Provides a streamlined, user-friendly editor for configuring the Optical Character Recognition settings on supported Datalogic devices.
  • Can be utilized on devices running Android 13 and above

Miscellaneousâ€‹

  • Added option to allow profile download over mobile data. Default profile behavior will still require a Wi-Fi connection. (ðŸ“Œrequires Agent v2.6.0 or later)
  • Added OCR Decode keycode to the Key Remapping page
  • Added setting to automatically find and use the next available port for sub components if the desired port is not available.
  • Added support for Memor 12/17 and Joya Touch A13 devices

Corrected Defectsâ€‹

  • Fixed an issue causing auto generated scripts to be placed after user configured scripts
  • Fixed an issue with importing a Visual Formatter profile containing multiple formatter items and dispatcher
  • Advanced Keyboard
    • Fixed an issue where keyboard version was being reset when editing a profile
    • Fixed an issue where changes made when editing a saved profile were sometimes not applied
    • Fixed an issue where old profiles were not loaded correctly when editing/importing
  • Fixed an issue where the mapping subject was not displayed when input value is set to ATTN for Key Remapping

entry.title: Datalogic Enterprise Browser 1.7.0
entry.content:
Enhancementsâ€‹

  • Updated to support Android 15
  • Enhanced custom image selection
    • Images are now included in exported configuration files
  • Initial zoom can be set up to 500%

Corrected Defectsâ€‹

entry.title: OEMConfig 2.10.0
entry.content:
Enhancementsâ€‹

  • Updated to support Android 15
  • Added support for new features:
    • Camera Wedge
    • Camera interoperability
    • Good Read overlay transparency
    • Intent wedge empty values

Corrected Defectsâ€‹

  • Corrected default values for:
    • No internet expected
    • Image decode timeout
    • Han Xin lengths

entry.title: Scan2Deploy Agent 2.6.0
entry.content:
Enhancementsâ€‹

  • Updated to support Android 15
  • Support enrollment within profile
  • Support deployment over non-WiFi networks (requires Scan2Deploy Studio update)

Corrected Defectsâ€‹

  • Unable to restore Enterprise backup that includes Agent update

entry.title: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.4.2
entry.summary: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.4.2 is now available. It includes new enhancements to scripting.
entry.content:
Scan2Deploy Studio 2.4.2 is now available. It includes new enhancements to scripting.

Downloads are available in the Releases section on the Scan2Deploy Studio Github page.

Enhancementsâ€‹

  • Added two new script commands:
    • PREFER - Set an application as preferred activity for a specified intent-filter.
    • FORGET - Clear an application of any associated intent-filters.

entry.title: Scan2Deploy Agent 2.5.1
entry.content:
Enhancementsâ€‹

  • Added two new script commands:
    • PREFER - Set an application as preferred activity for a specified intent-filter.
    • FORGET - Clear an application of any associated intent-filters.

entry.title: CODiScan SDK v1.0.0
entry.summary: The CODiScanâ„¢ HS7600 SDK empowers users to write Android applications that interface with a connected CODiScanâ„¢ HS7600 wearable Bluetooth bar code reader.
entry.content:
The CODiScanâ„¢ HS7600 SDK empowers users to write Android applications that interface with a connected CODiScanâ„¢ HS7600 wearable Bluetooth bar code reader.

SDK requires the installation of the CODiScan Service, which is available from GitHub.

The SDK can be imported into projects via Jitpack:

Features include:

  • Pair with a CODiScan device.
  • Disconnect from CODiScan device.
  • Listen to CODiScan connect/disconnect events.
  • Trigger 'Find My Device' function.
  • Get scan data from CODiScan.
  • Get CODiScan battery status.
  • Get CODiScan device data.
  • Get CODiScan configuration values.
  • Set CODiScan configuration values.

entry.title: Aladdin for CODiScan 3.5.2
entry.summary: The Aladdin application for CODiScan version 3.5.2 is now available.
entry.content:
The Aladdin application for CODiScan version 3.5.2 is now available.

Downloads are available in the Releases section on the Aladdin Github page.

Enhancementsâ€‹

  • Extended Channel Interpretation (ECI) support added.
  • New intent added for the Find My Device feature.

Corrected Defectsâ€‹

  • Default image capture type changed to trigger to make it easier to capture images.

entry.title: OEMConfig 2.9.1
entry.content:
Enhancementsâ€‹

  • Support rain mode touch sensitivity for Memor 12/17

entry.title: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.4.1
entry.summary: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.4.1 is now available. It includes many new enhancements and bug fixes. Read below for more details.
entry.content:
Scan2Deploy Studio 2.4.1 is now available. It includes many new enhancements and bug fixes. Read below for more details.

Downloads are available in the Releases section on the Scan2Deploy Studio Github page.

Enhancementsâ€‹

  • Added Memor 12 and Memor 17 device support
  • Added ability to change the barcode data density, resulting in fewer barcode scans for newer devices
  • Added support for PAC URL when configuring Wi-Fi proxy settings
  • Added versioning to Datalogic application configs to enable the Agent to indicate when there is a version mismatch

Corrected Defectsâ€‹

  • Fixed an issue that caused a few requests to fail when a proxy server was configured
  • Fixed an issue where manually uploaded APKs were not always removed when changing the deployment to barcode only
  • Fixed an issue where Key Remapping configuration could result in duplicate scripts being added on profile load/import
  • Fixed an issue where key remapping file did not always trigger the file hosting requirement
  • Fixed an issue where some apps were missing from the list for SX5 XLR GMS A13
  • Fixed an issue where apps installed from local files were not always removed when switching to a barcode only deployment

entry.title: Aladdin for CODiScan 3.4.1
entry.summary: The Aladdin application for CODiScan version 3.4.1 is now available.
entry.content:
The Aladdin application for CODiScan version 3.4.1 is now available.

Downloads are available in the Releases section on the Aladdin Github page.

Enhancementsâ€‹

  • Image capture feature added for debugging purposes.

Corrected Defectsâ€‹

  • Excessive notifications can come up when run on some devices.
  • App has problems upgrading when there is an active connection.
  • Extra carriage return sent at the end of barcode data.
  • Removed unnecessary permissions dialogs when run on Datalogic devices.

entry.title: Datalogic Enterprise Browser 1.6.0
entry.content:
Enhancementsâ€‹

  • Allow media capture (images, video, sound) from a web form
  • Allow Favorites button to be disabled
    • Toolbar will be hidden if no buttons are shown
    • Backdoor access to admin settings from a webpage
  • Wallpaper size support for Stretch to Crop and Fill
